```{r}
library("arrow")
library("dplyr")
```

```{r}
dataset <- read.csv("./dataset/cleaned_data.csv")
```

```{r}
head(dataset)
str(dataset)
summary(dataset)
```

```{r}
dataset |> select(where(~ any(is.na(.)))) |> mutate(across(where(is.character), as.factor)) |> summary()
na_counts <- tibble(
  column = names(dataset),
  na_count = colSums(is.na(dataset))
)

na_counts <- na_counts[na_counts$na_count > 0, ]

arrange(na_counts, desc(na_count))
```
